org.lightningj.paywall.lightninghandler.lnd

Class LNDHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightningj.paywall.lightninghandler.lnd.LNDHelper

  • public class LNDHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class with methods for converting between LND wrapper objects and paywall-core objects. Created by philip on 2018-11-25.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LNDHelper(org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.message.GetInfoResponse infoResponse)
      Constructor of LND helper methods parsing info from LND node.
      LNDHelper(java.lang.String supportedCurrency)
      Default constructor when supportedCurrency comes from configuration

        public LNDHelper(org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.message.GetInfoResponse infoResponse)

        Constructor of LND helper methods parsing info from LND node.
        Parameters:
        infoResponse - the GetInfoResponse from the LND node.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if no supported currency was given.

      • LNDHelper

        Default constructor when supportedCurrency comes from configuration
        Parameters:
        supportedCurrency - the configured currency code.

    • Method Detail

      • convert

        public Invoice convert(NodeInfo nodeInfo,
                       org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.message.Invoice lndInvoice)
        Help method to convert a LND Invoice to a Invoice value object.
        Parameters:
        nodeInfo - the related node info from LND node.
        lndInvoice - the LND invoice to convert.
        Returns:
        the converted Invoice.

      • genLNDInvoice

        public org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.message.Invoice genLNDInvoice(PreImageData preImageData,
                                                                ConvertedOrder paymentData)
                                                         throws InternalErrorException
        Method to generate an LND Invoice from a PreImageData and ConvertedOrder
        Parameters:
        preImageData - the preImageData value object to the invoice preimage and hash from.
        paymentData - the payment data to generate invoice value and expire date from.
        Returns:
        a newly generate LND Invoice object that can be used with lnd api to add.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if specified crypto amount is unsupported by LND implementation.

      • checkCryptoAmount

        protected void checkCryptoAmount(CryptoAmount amount)
                          throws InternalErrorException
        Method that the specified crypto amount is supported by LND.
        Parameters:
        amount - the crypto amount to used in LND invoice
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if crypto amount contained invalid values.

      • parseNodeInfo

        public NodeInfo parseNodeInfo(org.lightningj.lnd.wrapper.message.GetInfoResponse infoResponse)
                       throws InternalErrorException
        Method to parse a GetInfoResponse into a NodeInfo value object.
        Parameters:
        infoResponse - the GetInfoResponse from LND node.
        Returns:
        a parsed NodeInfo value object.
        Throws:
        InternalErrorException - if problem occurred parsing the LND node data.
